abstract: Detroit Tigers reliever Joel Zumaya still remains hopeful he can return to form and eventually to the majors.
snippet: Detroit Tigers reliever Joel Zumaya still remains hopeful he can return to form and eventually to the majors.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT -- The right-hander Joel Zumaya hopes that this won't be the last time he's on the field at Comerica Park, on the mound he's called home as a Detroit Tigers reliever since 2006.

headline.main: Tigers' Zumaya Hopes to Zoom Again
